channel.title: Ok im new and loaded with questions
channel.description:
1. how do i spawn npcs? 2. how do i make it so i can fight everybody (except for people in varrok if possible) 3. how do i make it so im the only mod on my server? 4. how can i make it so i dont have to be logged on my server for my friends to get on it? 5. well start with that and then il ask more when i understand this a little more.
thanks to all who can help me and to all that try.

item.title: Ok im new and loaded with questions
item.dc:creator: @rolovis rolovis
item.description:
@rolovis wrote:

ok my username and password arent in there…and everybodys player rights r 3. how do i make it so people start off with 1 of everything 10 hp and a normal player?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 03:11:20 PM[/size][hr]nobody knows? ok how do i make it so people quit getting disconnected?

Read full topic
item.source: Ok im new and loaded with questions

item.title: Ok im new and loaded with questions
item.dc:creator: @rolovis rolovis
item.description:
@rolovis wrote:

where are all these folders and scripts at? do i download them? all i have downloaded so far is the actual thing to install moparscape. and ctrl+f didnt work it didnt do anything.

ok i found the files but how do i look at them or edit them?[br][size=1]Posted on: June 26, 2007, 04:36:54 AM[/size][hr]how do i edit the scripts and folders???will someone please reply?

Read full topic
item.source: Ok im new and loaded with questions

item.title: Ok im new and loaded with questions
item.dc:creator: @bl1 bl@@d
item.description:
@bl1 wrote:

  1. in ur server folder
  2. ctrl+f nonwild and add coords
  3. open ur character file and change ur rights to 3

Read full topic

item.description:
@rolovis wrote:

  1. where do i find autospawn.cfg?
  2. how do i do…uh…that
  3. and that
  4. thanks 1 down 4 to go.
  5. ok almost done and thanks so far.

item.title: Ok im new and loaded with questions
item.dc:creator: @legend_rene legend rene
item.description:
@legend_rene wrote:

1: open up autospawn.cfg and look around
2:make safe zone search for nonwild in client.java and add the coords
3:change ur playerrights to 3 and no-one elses
4:u dont have to anyway…
5:ok finished

Read full topic
